name: bobsweep
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Your bObsweep is now at your service! Send your bot to clean and charge, all with your Alexa-enabled device.

To get started, download the bObsweep app on the App Store or Google Play. Create your account and connect your bot. Make sure your bot is connected to Wi-Fi before pairing with Alexa. Alexa is compatible with Bob PetHair Vision robotic vacuums.

After connecting Alexa, your bot is ready to respond to the call of your voice! To add a personal touch, give your bot a custom nickname. "Bob" is provided as a sample custom name below.

Send to clean:
"Alexa, start vaccum."
"Alexa, start Bob."
"Alexa, turn on vacuum."
"Alexa, turn on Bob."

Send to charge:
"Alexa, turn off vacuum."
"Alexa, turn off Bob."
